text:
Hi @all! Hope everyone is doing well. I have question regarding the Smart CTA. As, I have purchased "Sales Pro" and "Marketing Pro" product of HubSpot. I am not able to see the "create smart version" in CTA category.  If i can see the option what should i do for or vice-versa. Thanks  in advance :)
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cos-general/create-smart-calls-to-action-cta>
Hey man, first create the CTA, then go back to the list view, click “Action” menu, then “”Create smart version”
